official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the period of August 9 through 21, 1980, as a time of commemoration of the tricentennial of the Pueblo revolt of 1680.

summary.text: Recognizes the period of August 9 through August 21, 1980, as a time of commemoration of the tricentennial of the Pueblo revolt of 1680.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the period of August 9 through 21, 1980, as a time of commemoration of the tricentennial of the Pueblo revolt of 1680.
